title: Digital Blog-Based Scientific Writing Program to Mitigate Summer Learning Loss

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital tool proficiency and intermediate-level knowledge in science
context.additional_context: Blog-based writing activities using personal devices to mitigate the summer learning effect (SLE) and focus on improving scientific literacy.

learning_goals: Learners reduce summer learning loss by over 30% by writing science-related posts on a digital blog at least three times a week for one week.
Learners enhance scientific writing skills by performing peer feedback-informed revisions at least twice.
Learners complete at least five structured blog contents following the provided science topic activity guide.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
